pre_caption: In a wide, side-view shot, the scene initially frames two large, gray landmasses in the middle ground, separated by a central chasm. A timer is positioned in the top left foreground. A small, red, cube-shaped character appears on the top right platform and jumps into the chasm. The camera pans down, following the character as it descends through the center of the frame between hazardous, red-spiked walls. The character then moves toward the bottom left, landing on a small platform. The camera's movement concludes by framing the character in the bottom left middle ground, with a large cliff face occupying the right side of the frame and a mechanical structure supporting the platform from the bottom left.
